page.description: Opens the 'Customize RadioButton Style' property settings.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Customize RadioButton Style]* dialog can be used to customize how each radio button option is displayed. The *[ui:Customize RadioButton Style]* dialog is the same dialog used to create a *[link:custom appearance for CheckBox controls@ux checkbox custom appeaerance designer]*.
